# Lot.ClosingDate property

Gets the closing date of this lot.

```csharp
public DateTime ClosingDate { get; }
```

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| InvalidOperationException | Throws when this lot doesn't have any splits or is still open. |
